name: Virtuoso Launch, Agents and Other Install Actions

FROM TessenAction

WHERE eventName = 'DataConnections_SetupOS_versionSelected' AS 'OS Version Selected',

AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' 
SINCE 6 months AGO

widgets.title: Per User Clicks Guided Install / APM / Full Install Library

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM TessenAction
SELECT count(email)
WHERE eventName in ('INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallMethod','INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickFullLibrary', 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickDocs')
FACET CASES (
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallMethod' AS 'Select Install Method',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickFullLibrary' AS 'See Full Library',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickDocs' AS 'See Docs'
), installMethod
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX

FROM TessenAction
SELECT count(email)
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall'
AND email not like '%newrelic.com'
FACET option
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX

FROM TessenAction SELECT uniqueCount(email) WHERE eventName LIKE 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_viewNR1InstallOSPage' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET email, accountName SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT 100

FROM TessenAction
SELECT uniqueCount(email)
WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%'
AND category = 'GuidedInstall'
AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com'
FACET CASES (
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_viewNR1InstallOSPage' AS 'View Virtuoso Install Page',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickSelectAccount' AS 'Select Account',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickOS' AS 'Select OS',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickCopyCmd' AS 'Code Snippet Copied',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_seeYourData' AS 'See Your Data',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AS 'Complete Install',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallMethod' AS 'Select Install Method',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickBack' AS 'Select Back',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickFullLibrary' AS 'See Full Library',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickAppLanguage' AS 'See App Language',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickDocs' AS 'View docs',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickProgressStep' AS 'Select Progress Step',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_userToggledCustomizeOption' AS 'Customize Options',
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallLog' AS 'Select Log',
WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%' as 'Others'
)
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%' AND category = 'GuidedInstall' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET CASES ( WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_viewNR1InstallOSPage' AS 'View Virtuoso Install Page', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickSelectAccount' AS 'Select Account', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickOS' AS 'Select OS', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickCopyCmd' AS 'Code Snippet Copied', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_seeYourData' AS 'See Your Data', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AS 'Complete Install', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallMethod' AS 'Select Install Method', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickBack' AS 'Select Back', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickFullLibrary' AS 'See Full Library', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickAppLanguage' AS 'See App Language', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickDocs' AS 'View docs', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickProgressStep' AS 'Select Progress Step', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_userToggledCustomizeOption' AS 'Customize Options', WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_clickInstallLog' AS 'Select Log', WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%' as 'Others' ) SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM TessenAction WHERE category = 'GuidedInstall' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET email SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT 25 TIMESERIES

FROM TessenAction
SELECT uniqueCount(email)
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall'
AND email not like '%newrelic.com'
FACET option
TIMESERIES 6 hours
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%' AND category = 'GuidedInstall' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET CASES (  WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AS 'Complete Install' ) SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

FROM TessenAction
SELECT
  filter(count(*), WHERE `infrastructure-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED')) / filter(count(*), WHERE `infrastructure-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Infra Agent',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Infra Logs',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-docker-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-docker-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Docker Logs',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Apache Tomcat OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Cassandra OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'JMX OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Memcached OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MSSQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MySQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'NGINX OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Redis OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MongoDB OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `dotnet-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND (`infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED' or `infrastructure-agent-installer` IS NULL)) / filter(count(*), WHERE `dotnet-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'APM/.NET'
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall'
AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' AND email NOT LIKE '%+%'
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM TessenAction
SELECT
  filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Apache Tomcat OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Cassandra OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'JMX OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Memcached OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MSSQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MySQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'NGINX OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Redis OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` = 'FAILED' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'MongoDB OHI'
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' and installMethod in ('ohi','guided')
AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' AND email NOT LIKE '%+%'
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
FACET installMethod

FROM TessenAction
SELECT
  filter(count(*), WHERE `infrastructure-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED')) / filter(count(*), WHERE `infrastructure-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED')) * 100 AS 'Infra Agent',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Infra Logs',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-docker-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `logs-docker-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Docker Logs',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `apache-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Apache Tomcat OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `cassandra-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Cassandra OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `jmx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'JMX OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `memcached-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Memcached OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mssql-server-integration-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'MSSQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mysql-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'MySQL OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `nginx-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'NGINX OHI',  filter(count(*), WHERE `postgres-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `postgres-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Postgres OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `redis-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'Redis OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') / filter(count(*), WHERE `mongodb-open-source-integration` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'MongoDB OHI',
  filter(count(*), WHERE `dotnet-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED') AND (`infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED' or `infrastructure-agent-installer` IS NULL)) / filter(count(*), WHERE `dotnet-agent-installer` in ('FAILED','CANCELED','INSTALLED') AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED') * 100 AS 'APM/.NET'
WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall'
AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' AND email NOT LIKE '%+%'
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM TessenAction
SELECT count(*) FACET option AS 'OS'

AND category = 'GuidedInstall'
AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com'
SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST'
LIMIT MAX
FROM InfraAgentMetric SELECT uniqueCount(entityId) AS 'Total Infra Agents' SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' TIMESERIES

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) AS 'Guided Install' WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED' SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' TIMESERIES
FROM InfraAgentMetric SELECT uniqueCount(entityId) AS 'Total Infra Agents' SINCE 1 DAY AGO COMPARE WITH 2 DAYS AGO

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) AS 'Guided Install' WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' SINCE 1 DAY AGO COMPARE WITH 2 DAYS AGO

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) AS 'Guided Install' WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AND `infrastructure-agent-installer` = 'INSTALLED' SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' TIMESERIES
FROM InfraAgentMetric SELECT uniqueCount(entityId) AS 'Total Infra Agents' SINCE 1 DAY AGO COMPARE WITH 2 DAYS AGO

FROM TessenAction SELECT count(*) WHERE eventName like 'INSTALL_%' AND category = 'GuidedInstall' AND email NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET CASES (  WHERE eventName = 'INSTALL_GuidedInstall_completeInstall' AS 'Complete Install' ) SINCE '2021-03-02 06:00:00 PST' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT timestamp, environment, feedbackType, message, userEmail, userId FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE environment IN ('production', 'eu-production') AND artifactId = 'nr1-install-newrelic.nr1-install-newrelic' OR origin = 'GUIDED_INSTALL' AND userEmail NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' SINCE 5 DAYS AGO LIMIT MAX

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE environment IN ('production', 'eu-production') AND artifactId = 'nr1-install-newrelic.nr1-install-newrelic' OR origin = 'GUIDED_INSTALL' AND userEmail NOT LIKE '%@newrelic.com' FACET feedbackType SINCE 1 day ago

FROM TessenAction
SELECT count(*)
where error_message is NOT null and error_message != '' and email not like '%newrelic.com' and email not like '%+%'
where eventName like '%complete%'
FACET CASES (
WHERE error_message like '%reached max validation attempts' AS 'Max Validation Timeout',
WHERE (error_message like '%exit status 100' or error_message like '%exit status 20') AS 'Linux no systemctl',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%nginx-open-source-integration%' AS 'Nginx no status URL',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%apache-open-source-integration%' AS 'Apache no status URL',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%mysql-open-source-integration%' AS 'MySQL incorrect user permission',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%postgres-open-source-integration%' AS 'Postgres incorrect user permission',
WHERE (error_message like '%exit status 11' or error_message like '%exit status 12' or error_message like '%exit status 13') and error_message like '%postgres-open-source-integration%' AS 'Postgres incorrect SSL/Cert',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 1' and error_message like '%assert_pre_req%' and error_message like '%mssql-server-integration-installer%' AS 'Microsoft SQL Server incorrect user permission',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 21' AS 'No Infra Agent Available',
WHERE error_message like '%validation cancelled' AS 'User cancelled validation',
WHERE error_message like '%exit status 16' and error_message like '%logs-%' AS 'No log files'
 ) SINCE 1 days ago LIMIT MAX

SELECT count(*) from TessenAction where error_message like '%status 21' and email not like '%newrelic.com' and email not like '%+%' where eventName like '%complete%' since 1 day ago LIMIT MAX facet hostinfo_os, hostinfo_platform, hostinfo_platformVersion

FROM TessenAction
SELECT error_message
where error_message is NOT null and error_message != '' and email not like '%newrelic.com' and email not like '%+%'
where eventName like '%complete%'
WHERE error_message not like '%reached max validation attempts'
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 100' or error_message like '%exit status 20')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%nginx-open-source-integration%')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%apache-open-source-integration%')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%mysql-open-source-integration%')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 2' and error_message like '%postgres-open-source-integration%')
WHERE not ((error_message like '%exit status 11' or error_message like '%exit status 12' or error_message like '%exit status 13') and error_message like '%postgres-open-source-integration%')
WHERE not (error_message like '%validation cancelled')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 21')
WHERE not (error_message like '%exit status 16' and error_message like '%logs-%')
SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
